remarks: Cancellation law for group division.  ( ~ nncan analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2015.)
statement:
ablnncan.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ablnncan.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
ablnncan.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) $.
ablnncan.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
ablnncan.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
ablnncan $p |- ( ph -> ( X .- ( X .- Y ) ) = Y ) $.
